oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Andrew Johnson's office
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Stereograph no. 4, Andrew Johnson's office, in the rear of what is known as Johnson's Block, taken at the time of President Andrew Johnson's funeral.
A series of 12 of these views taken on same day form an interesting and comprehensive idea of the occasion in Greeneville and surroundings.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: L.W. Keen
